thread.title: PCT, Syngenta Recognize Crown Leadership Winners
thread.title_full: PCT, Syngenta Recognize Crown Leadership Winners

title: PCT, Syngenta Recognize Crown Leadership Winners
text:
PCT, Syngenta Recognize Crown Leadership Winners Five pest control industry leaders were recognized last week in Nashville. October 26, 2015 NASHVILLE, Tenn. — PCT and Syngenta recognize the Crown Leadership Award winners last week at NPMA PestWorld 2015, in Nashville. The awards spotlight individuals who have contributed positively to the growth and development of the structural pest control industry, as well as established ties with fellow business leaders, civic groups and customers in their local communities. This is the 27th consecutive year in which Syngenta has partnered with PCT for the awards. “We couldn’t be more proud to recognize five individuals who give tirelessly of themselves for the success of their organizations, the benefit of the pest control industry and the betterment of their communities,” said PCT Publisher Dan Moreland. “We also thank our sponsor Syngenta for their continued support of this important industry program.” • Ron Harrison , Rollins, Atlanta, Ga. • Jennifer Leggett , Lindsey Pest Services, Jacksonville, Fla. • Chris McCloud , McCloud Services, South Elgin, Ill. • Trace McEuen , Univar, Austin, Texas • Dr. Ed Vargo , Texas A&M University, College Station, Texas Norm Cooper. In addition to recognizing this year’s winners, PCT and Syngenta present a “Lifetime Achievement Award” to industry consultant Norm Cooper. Cooper was chosen by previous Crown Leadership award winners in voting that took place prior to PestWorld 2015. If you know of a member of the pest control industry you would like to nominate for next year’s awards, email dmoreland@gie.net. Related PPMA Board Approves 2016 Media/PR Plan October 26, 2015
